elements.name: question1
elements.title: Which is the highest mountain in Switzerland? Also state the source(s) of the information.
elements.correctAnswer: The Dom is the highest mountain in Switzerland that lies entirely on Swiss soil. Highest main peak in Switzerland (without secondary peaks): Dufourspitze, but large parts of the mountain lie in Italy.
